title: Table
description: Table; Attributed to André-Charles Boulle (French, 1642 - 1732, master before 1666); Paris, France; about 1680 - 1685; Oak veneered with marquetry tortoise shell, pewter, brass, ebony, horn, ivory, boxwood, cherry, natural and stained sycamore, pear, thuya, satinwood, cedar, beech and amaranth; gilt-bronze mounts; 72.1 x 110.5 x 73.7 cm (28 3/8 x 43 1/2 x 29 in.); 71.DA.100; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
